Captain Bathis:
Talisman of Aden can be enchanted with a special enchanting scroll.
Double-click on the Scroll: Enchant Talisman of Aden, point the Talisman of Aden and click on the Ok button to start enchanting.
But keep in mind that you can enchant your Talisman of Aden safety to +1. After that there's a chance to fail the process, and in that case the item will be destroyed.
